docs.title: Welcome
docs.text:
Welcome to my documentation project.

This is the home page of my Developer Docs Practice site.

docs.title: Architecture
docs.text:
This document describes the high-level architecture of the system.

  • Frontend: React-based UI
  • Backend: Node.js REST API
  • Database: MongoDB
  • Authentication: JWT-based

docs.title: Design Document
docs.text: This document provides details about the system design.

docs.title: Login Flow
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant Frontend
    participant Backend
    participant Database

    User->>Frontend: Login form
    Frontend->>Backend: API Request
    Backend->>Database: Verify credentials
    Database-->>Backend: Result
    Backend-->>Frontend: Success/Failure
    Frontend-->>User: Show message
